name: A Normal Survey (PROTOTYPE)
description:
The survey that gets progressively more intense.

This is a short, mildly creepy game, but there’s a twist. There is nothing dark or evil. There is no enemy. There is no way to lose.

The questions get more intense as you go on, but you are in no danger at all.

— Backstory — You are looking to download a pirated movie. After a little while of looking, you find a suspicious website and are forced to complete a captcha that asks you many questions. You need to complete all of them in order to download your movie.
— Development —THIS GAME IS NOT EVEN CLOSE TO DONE. This was prototyped using an online quiz maker. I wanted to present my ideas before I go and release a full blown game about it. Quality is bad, but this is a playable build.
No pre-releases will be uploaded because it is a small project.

The final product will be made using GameMaker Studio 2, and will be playable on PC and Mac.An Android release will be made using MIT App Inventor 2.There will be no iOS build because I have to do a ton of legal stuff, and I’m not ready to fully commit to mobile development.
